tool_description: Delivers patented phone-based verification and two-factor authentication using a time-based, one-time passcode sent over SMS
name: Telesign SMS Verify
title: Telesign SMS Verify

api_list.name: Send Verification Code

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: Your test phone number with no special characters or spaces.

utterances.utterance: Send a verification code to the phone number 1234567890 with the code 1234.
Please verify the phone number 9876543210 using the code 5678.
Send a verification code 4321 to the phone number 5551234567.
Verify the phone number 9998887777 with the code 9876.
Send a verification code 2468 to the phone number 1112223333.
Verify the phone number 4445556666 using the code 1357.
Send a verification code 8642 to the phone number 7778889999.
Verify the phone number 2223334444 with the code 7531.
Send a verification code 9512 to the phone number 6667778888.
Verify the phone number 3334445555 using the code 6824.
